description: FHIRPACK (FHIR Python Analysis Client and Kit) is a general purpose FHIR client that simplifies the access, analysis and representation of FHIR and EHR data using PANDAS, an ETL philosophy and a functional syntax. FHIRPACK was designed and developed at the IKIM MML (https://mml.ikim.nrw/) and HDDBS (https://dbs.ifi.uni-heidelberg.de/).
title: FHIRPACK (FHIR Python Analysis Client and Kit)
